nodes.text: The Brooch of Luristan was an opalescent turquoise brooch with a symmetrical pattern. Passel Argente, Magistrate of the Corporate Alliance, wore the brooch within the folds of his crocheted hood while attending a meeting of the Separatist Council on the planet Geonosis in 22 BBY.

The Brooch of Luristan first appeared in the 2002 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. The prop was first identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
